message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $150. I think you'll find it's a steal at this rate.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. That's the most I'm willing to pay.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $150 is my ideal price, I could come down to $130 for you.  I believe this product offers exceptional value, even at that price.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not sure I can go up to $130. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $110. That's the highest I'm willing to pay.
